enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding options or option groups to the Options instance, which affects the internal state of the object.
Both methods involve adding options with specific attributes (e.g., required, argument requirements) that can be used to set up similar test scenarios.
The hasOption method can be used to verify that the option added by addOption is correctly present in the Options instance.
The getOption method can be used to retrieve the added option and verify its properties (e.g., longOpt, required status).
